quest.name: A Season for War
journal: Cirina does not usually depend on the kindness of strangers, but will gladly make an exception today.

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: You...you want to help me, is that it?

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: I do not know what to say... Thank you, Forename, thank you!

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: The lumbering ones we must fell wander the plains to the west of Reunion. If we each harvest two, then we should have enough whisperroot.

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: Return here when you have finished. Good luck!

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: Welcome back, Forename. Have you brought the whisperroot?

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: Blessed is he who shows kindness to strangers, for with fortune does he ever ride.

dialogue.name: MASGUD
dialogue.text: It shall. The kinsai is yours.

dialogue.name: MASGUD
dialogue.text: The gods favor you more than you know, child. Udgan rarely have need of such herbs, and so my stock is limited. Had you come a day earlier or later, I would have none for you.

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: Perhaps the gods guided me here, as they guided Grandmother. As they guided this womanman from the West...
